amendment.description: To strike the provisions providing immunity from civil liability to electronic communication service providers for certain assistance provided to the Government.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3907 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 31 - 67. Record Vote Number: 15.

action.text: Amendment SA 3907 proposed by Senator Dodd to Amendment SA 3911. (consideration: CR S644-647; text: CR S644) To strike the provisions providing immunity from civil liability to electronic communication service providers for certain assistance provided to the Government.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3907 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 31 - 67. Record Vote Number: 15.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3907 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 31 - 67. Record Vote Number: 15.
